  • Method Details

    • checkSubscriptionExists

      public SubscriptionApi.CheckSubscriptionExistsAdapter checkSubscriptionExists(String subscriptionHrn, Optional<String> billingTag)
      Checks whether a subscription with the specified HRN exists.

      Path: /subscriptions/{subscriptionHrn}

      Method: HEAD

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : (OK)

      code 401 : (Unauthorized)

      code 403 : (Forbidden - A subscription with the specified HRN doesn't exist or access to this subscription is forbidden.)

      code 404 : (Not Found - A subscription with the specified HRN doesn't exist.)

      Parameters:
      subscriptionHrn - The HERE Resource Name (HRN) of the subscription.
      billingTag - The billingTag parameter is an optional free-form tag that you can use to group billing records together. If supplied, it must be between 4 - 16 characters, contain only alpha/numeric ASCII characters [A-Za-z0-9]. Grouping billing records by billing tag will be available in future releases.

    • checkSubscriptionExists

      public SubscriptionApi.CheckSubscriptionExistsBuilder checkSubscriptionExists()

    • createSubscription

      public SubscriptionApi.CreateSubscriptionAdapter createSubscription(String xIdempotencyKey, com.here.platform.data.client.base.generated.scaladsl.model.config.CreateSubscriptionRequestBody createSubscriptionRequestBody)
      Creates a subscription between the source catalog/layer and target catalog/layer.

      Path: /subscriptions

      Method: POST

      Expected answers:

      code 202 : SubscriptionStatusToken (Accepted - your request was received and is being processed.)

      code 400 : (Bad Request - indicates that your request failed fast validation due to an issue, such as syntax or logical errors.)

      code 401 : (Unauthorized)

      code 403 : (Forbidden)

      code 409 : (Conflict - indicates that: * a subscription token with the same x-idempotency-key but different subscription already exists or is in the process of being created, * or a subscription with the same source, destination, and type already exists. )

      Parameters:
      xIdempotencyKey - x-idempotency-key is the unique value generated by the client to create a subscription request. Any additional retry requests must have the same x-idempotency-key header value and the same body content as the first subscription request. If the retry request body content is different, then the server will return a 409 status code. It is recommended to use UUID v4 for x-idempotency-key value. Minimum length: 10, maximum length: 255.
      createSubscriptionRequestBody - A subscription configuration object.

    • createSubscription

      public SubscriptionApi.CreateSubscriptionBuilder createSubscription()

    • deleteSubscription

      public SubscriptionApi.DeleteSubscriptionAdapter deleteSubscription(String subscriptionHrn, String xIdempotencyKey, Optional<String> billingTag)
      Deletes a subscription associated with the HRN.

      Path: /subscriptions/{subscriptionHrn}

      Method: DELETE

      Expected answers:

      code 202 : SubscriptionStatusToken (Accepted - your request was received and is being processed.)

      code 400 : (Bad Request - indicates that your request failed fast validation due to an issue, such as syntax or logical errors.)

      code 401 : (Unauthorized)

      code 403 : (Forbidden - Access to this subscription is forbidden.)

      code 404 : (Not Found - A subscription with the specified HRN doesn't exist.)

      code 409 : (Conflict - indicates that a subscription token with the same x-idempotency-key but a different subscription already exists or is in the process of being deleted.)

      Parameters:
      subscriptionHrn - The HERE Resource Name (HRN) of the subscription.
      xIdempotencyKey - x-idempotency-key is the unique value generated by the client to create a subscription request. Any additional retry requests must have the same x-idempotency-key header value and the same body content as the first subscription request. If the retry request body content is different, then the server will return a 409 status code. It is recommended to use UUID v4 for x-idempotency-key value. Minimum length: 10, maximum length: 255.
      billingTag - The billingTag parameter is an optional free-form tag that you can use to group billing records together. If supplied, it must be between 4 - 16 characters, contain only alpha/numeric ASCII characters [A-Za-z0-9]. Grouping billing records by billing tag will be available in future releases.

    • deleteSubscription

      public SubscriptionApi.DeleteSubscriptionBuilder deleteSubscription()

    • getSubscription

      public SubscriptionApi.GetSubscriptionAdapter getSubscription(String subscriptionHrn, Optional<String> billingTag)
      Returns the configuration of the subscription associated with the HRN.

      Path: /subscriptions/{subscriptionHrn}

      Method: GET

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : OneOfSubscriptionInteractiveMapLayer (OK)

      code 401 : (Unauthorized)

      code 403 : (Forbidden - A subscription with the specified HRN doesn't exist or access to this subscription is forbidden.)

      code 404 : (Not Found - A subscription with the specified HRN doesn't exist.)

      Parameters:
      subscriptionHrn - The HERE Resource Name (HRN) of the subscription.
      billingTag - The billingTag parameter is an optional free-form tag that you can use to group billing records together. If supplied, it must be between 4 - 16 characters, contain only alpha/numeric ASCII characters [A-Za-z0-9]. Grouping billing records by billing tag will be available in future releases.

    • getSubscription

      public SubscriptionApi.GetSubscriptionBuilder getSubscription()

    • getSubscriptionStatus

      public SubscriptionApi.GetSubscriptionStatusAdapter getSubscriptionStatus(String statusToken, Optional<String> billingTag)
      Returns the configuration of the subscription associated with the HRN.

      Path: /subscriptions/status/{statusToken}

      Method: GET

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : SubscriptionStatus (OK)

      code 400 : (Bad Request - indicates that your request failed fast validation due to an issue, such as syntax or logical errors.)

      code 401 : (Unauthorized)

      code 403 : (Forbidden)

      code 404 : (Not Found - no action is associated with the provided token.)

      Parameters:
      statusToken - Status token from the create/delete subscription response.
      billingTag - The billingTag parameter is an optional free-form tag that you can use to group billing records together. If supplied, it must be between 4 - 16 characters, contain only alpha/numeric ASCII characters [A-Za-z0-9]. Grouping billing records by billing tag will be available in future releases.

    • getSubscriptionStatus

      public SubscriptionApi.GetSubscriptionStatusBuilder getSubscriptionStatus()

    • listSubscriptions

      public SubscriptionApi.ListSubscriptionsAdapter listSubscriptions(Optional<String> billingTag, Optional<Integer> limit, Optional<String> pageToken)
      Lists all subscriptions that your account has access to.

      Path: /subscriptions

      Method: GET

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : SubscriptionList (Paginated list of subscription configurations.)

      code 401 : (Unauthorized)

      code 403 : (Forbidden)

      Parameters:
      billingTag - The billingTag parameter is an optional free-form tag that you can use to group billing records together. If supplied, it must be between 4 - 16 characters, contain only alpha/numeric ASCII characters [A-Za-z0-9]. Grouping billing records by billing tag will be available in future releases.
      limit - Maximum number of items to return.
      pageToken - Token to access other pages. To access next page use the nextPageToken fields in the response or previousPageToken to access previous page.

    • listSubscriptions

      public SubscriptionApi.ListSubscriptionsBuilder listSubscriptions()

      public SubscriptionApi withConfig(ApiConfiguration apiConfig)
